data.text: @dhjohar Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please check

@juan_mon11 Hola Juan, sorry to read this. If the luggage doesn't arrive, please open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operates the last flight in your itinerary. Best regards
@abstandlanguage Hola, sorry to read this. Are you claiming missing Avios on an Iberia Plus account or a BA Executive account? Please send us a DM with more details https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Rossa_Fra Hola, sorry to read this. Could you please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Dijahbxo Hola Dijah, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR (property irregularity report) reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@vacernuda The only way to make a flight change is over the phone, as we're not allowed to receive credit card numbers through social media channels. We kindly ask you to wait for our colleagues' contact
@vacernuda Hola, we're sorry to read this. We've asked our colleagues to reach you over the phone and help you out with the flight change. Please wait for their call
@ysolomont Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@kgwallo We're deeply sorry, Keith. We've just sent a new message to the claims department. Regards
@dawn_kwan8 Hola Dawn, sorry to read this. If you are still at the airport, please contact our colleagues there for further assistance. We remain at your disposal

@JMurz28 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. We can see that you contacted the baggage centre over the phone and they sent a message to the airport asking about your bag's delivery. We kindly ask you to please wait for an update by email or SMS. Best regards
@candeeliita04 Hola Candela, ¿Iniciaste una reclamación en aeropuerto? De ser así, ¿Podrías enviarnos el número PIR y tu nombre completo por MD, por favor? Saludos.
@KevinDBrill your original claim code and provide additional infos explaining exactly what you need. Regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @KevinDBrill Hola Kevin. We're sorry to read this. If you wish to appeal and have the case reviewed by our colleagues, you need to use the same online form https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. Select  ‘assistance’ as complaint reason, then choose any other option and use the text box to inform /1

urls.title: 5 beach restaurants in spain | Iberia Plus
urls.description: 5 beach restaurants for fine dining in spain

data.text: Escaping to the beach this summer? We've selected the best beach bars and restaurants in Spain where you can enjoy fine food by the sea. Discover them in Iberia Plus magazine: https://t.co/4q2BMrJhHe https://t.co/Qs3zy1o2Ja

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @talecharley Hola, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@DennisBailey Sorry, but we really couldn't locate the DMs you mention. Please send us a new DM with the details https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@ssergorp_ Hola John, could you send us by private message the details of your request, your booking code, last name, e-ticket number, we will gladly help you from here? Thank you.
https://t.co/504lHjU2BE

@producermariel Hola Mariel, we're deeply sorry. Unfortunately, right now there are many missing bags at the airport and the handling agents need to check each one of them. So it's taking longer than usual to confirm the missing bag's arrival and initiate the delivery process. Apologies
@DennisBailey Hola Dennis, we wait for your information by DM. Thank you.
@GeordieJolly Hola Geordie, we sent you a DM. Could you check it? Thank you.
@DennisBailey Hola Dennis, we just have one message from you, please let us try to help. Thank you.
@IonaItalia Thank you.
@dawnchambers85 Hola Dawn, please send us all the details and how we can help you by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@IonaItalia Hola Iona, we are sorry to read this, please send us all the details by DM and tell us how we can help. Thank you.
@IonaItalia Hola Iona, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@paulapomroy Hola Paola, we sent you a DM a couple of days ago with the procedure, please send us a DM if you have any doubts. Regards.
@jusalasgo Hola Juliana, te hemos solicitado información adicional a través de nuestra conversación privada. Quedamos pendientes.
@DennisBailey Hola Dennis, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM all details of your situation and if you opened the baggage claim at the airport? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@mienos1993 Hello Annemjn. Have you spoken with our colleagues at the airport desks to check your options and alternatives regarding your booking status? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa ?
Kind Regards
@Sharandish Hola Sharan, we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.
@phatgav Hello Gavin. We have answered your direct message. Kind regards,
@0xKaren Hola Karen, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, IB account number and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@stevenp2102 Hola Steven, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@CCarson09784955 When a flight is cancelled while the passenger is already at the airport, the relocation can only be made by the agents at the airport. Sorry for the inconvenience
@missmoparker Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs. Regards
@cr12356789 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Regards
@ProkopovaOlena Hola, we've just replied your DMs

@donnaclewis14 Unfortunately, the change is only possible under the fare conditions, which doesn't include the option of asking for a change free of charge. So we're not able to provide a different answer. Sorry
@donnaclewis14 As explained previously, since the involuntary flight change is for less than 5h, the flight change free of charge doesn't apply. Sorry

@donnaclewis14 Sorry, Donna. Since the new flight departs less than 5h from the original one, the flight change free of charge or the refund doesn't apply. Please contact Serviberia over the phone for further assistance: (+1) 800-772-4642
@ArtySausage Unfortunately is not possible to call, as we told you before your trip, you should check the voucher number st: https://t.co/EOEDtrCMBN, Regards.

@amaaaliss Hola, how may we assist you? If your bag went missing and you opened a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary, please send us a DM with the PIR number and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

urls.title: Iberia voucher: ticket refund to spend whenever you want
urls.description: Are you flying soon but are not able to fly? We can refund the amount in the form of a voucher to use whenever and however you want. Check terms & conditions

data.text: @ArtySausage You're welcome. Notice that, since you paid for the tickets with a voucher, the refund was processed to the same voucher and the credits are available for you since may. Here you can check the voucher's balance https://t.co/tKLTKrKTN4 . Kind regards
@producermariel Hola Mariel, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@ArtySausage We've located the claim and we'll ask our colleagues to move on with your case. Kind regards
@gidders3 We've just replied your DM. Best regards

@donnaclewis14 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Unfortunately, the rule you quote is for cancellations/changes that happen closer to the flight's departure, while your flight change happened one month before the flight and it's for less than 5h. Please check our DM. Regards
@ArtySausage Sorry for the delay. Please send us a DM with your email address and the claim reference number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@austin_kimmy Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR (property irregularity report) reference number https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@gidders3 Hola, sorry to read this. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@NoraTogersen We've just replied the DM, Nora. Best regards
@MIZ_BIOS Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport? Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@gummibaat Hola Marvin. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@NoraTogersen Hola Nora, sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR reference and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@tspiegy Hola, we're sorry to read this and kindly ask you to please wait in line for further assistance. Best regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @ArtySausage Hola Jude, we already gave you the information, the refund was made to the same payment method that you used to the last booking. We can´t add any further information form this channel, you can address your complain from: https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG. Our apologies.

@cia262 Hola Christian, we are sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with more information about what happened so we can help you. We remain at your disposal, kind regards.
@ellis_bray22 Hola Ellis, please send us the details to check this matter, Thank you.

@CCarson09784955 Hola Carson, we are sorry to read this, in this case, your son needs to contact our desk agents and they will help him with the available options to reschedule the flight. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LaMaraahr Hola, hemos respondido tu md
@annebalad Hola Anne, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards
@donnaclewis14 Hola Donna, thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards
@ldena15 Hola Idena, si dirigiste tu caso vía legal a partir de ello cualquier novedad o actualización deberás solicitarla por ese canal, saludos
@donnaclewis14 Hola Donna. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...) Regards.

@TurnJorgeZapata Hola Jorge, lamentamos los inconvenientes. ¿Reportaste este incidente en el aeropuerto? Por favor envíanos un DM con tu código PIR para que podamos revisar. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Juleswindmill as there’s a limit per flight, you have to contact Serviberia over the phone. Here you find our numbers listed by country: https://t.co/l1faDG9MRb. Regards

urls.title: Travelling with pets - Iberia
urls.description: Travelling with pets on board is now possible with Iberia. Click here to find out what documents you need to travel with your pet

data.text: @Juleswindmill Hola Jules. On the following link you can find all details concerning travelling with pets with Iberia https://t.co/r9dIo7KCmF. Then, to check if there is room for your pets on the flights operated by us, /1

data.text: @LilianTodter Hola Lilian, we're sorry for the delay and have just replied your DMs. Regards
@AdnanKhan5703 Hola Adnan, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@wolvesboy40 Hola Phil, could you tell us by a DM who was the operator of your delay flight? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@dickonprior Hola Dickon, in this case, please contact with Iberia Express directly. Regards.
@dickonprior Hello Dickon, if all the flights in your reservation are future flights, you should contact the company who issued your booking. Regards.
@AdnanKhan5703 Hola Adnan, we replied to your DM.  Regards,
@dealhoover Hola.we sent your request and we will contact you as soon as possible. Kind regards.
@ArzooIe Thank you.
@TheEdgeofTech23 Hola Jack, please give us the details of your complaint and the references of the two tickets to check it. Thank you.
@milton15 Hola Ian, we sent you a DM. Thank you.
@susanemurphy Hello, Susan. What information did our colleagues tell you? Do you want to request a refund or a flight rescheduling? Please send us a DM with all the details of the case. Kind regards.
@LuluLeon7 Hello. We are very sorry that you have that impression. If we can help anything from here, please let us out. Kind regards.
@AdnanKhan5703 Hello. We are sorry for the delay in your flight. If we can help with anything here, please send us a Dm. Kind regards.
@russrobert There you can detail the reasons for your disagreement so that your case can be reviewed again. Kind regards. /2

@russrobert Hello. If our customer service colleagues have already responded to your claim and you are not satisfied with the resolution, you can appeal this decision by submitting a new claim on the web but under the "Assistance" section. /1
@dealhoover Hello. Thanks for writing to us. Please let us know all the details of your case through a direct message. Kind regards.
@wolvesboy40 Hello, Phil. We apologize for any inconvenience that may have arisen. If we can help anything from here, please let us know. Kind regards.
@jusalasgo Hola Juliana, lamentamos tu maleta este demorada, en cuanto haya una coincidencia en el sistema serás contactada, saludos

@Nancy74815230 Hello, Nancy. We are very sorry for the inconvenience that arose. As we indicated through the MD you sent us. please tell the passenger to write to us through their personal Facebook or Twitter profile. Kind regards.

data.text: @mike_rutter Hello. From social media we could not tell you the details of the response to your claim since we are an information channel. As for the seat issue. Please send us your reservation code and EMD codes or proof of purchase of the seats. Kind regards.

@SchobitzRuben Hello, Ruben. We are very sorry that you have that impression. As we indicated through the DM you sent us, you will need to verify all the details with the reservations area. Kind regards.
@ldena15 Hola, hemos respondido tu último md, un saludo
@lautgesetz Hello; David. We are sorry for the delay in the process, the area in charge is working on your case, we hope that they can contact you as soon as possible. Kind regards.
@nimodosoygus Hola Gus, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@wolvesboy40 Hola Phil, we don´t know the details of what happened, please send a DM with more information so we can help you. We remain at your disposal, regards
@LaMaraahr Hola, hemos contestado a tu MD. Saludos
@ArzooIe Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
